title: Optimizing performance viewing experiences to enhance arts participation: Short-term intensive course for secondary learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of art forms and lack of performance attendance experience
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones with limited PC access. Creative approaches integrating connections to mathematics curricula are required

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply the importance of pre-performance preparatory learning before attending a performance.
Learners acquire basic knowledge of three or more art forms (e.g., music, theater, dance).
Learners can identify and evaluate five key appreciation points when viewing a performance.
Learners present at least one creative case connecting performance experiences with mathematical concepts (e.g., ratios, patterns, spatial composition).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
